Db Util¶

class util.db_util.DbUtil[source]¶

This class provides database utilities

close_connection(cnx)[source]¶

closes DB connection

Parameters:cnx (Object) – DB connection to close
get_connection(config)[source]¶

gets DB connection

Parameters:config (dict) – the DB configuration file
get_issue_dependency_type_id(cnx, name)[source]¶

selects issue dependency type id

Parameters:
  • cnx (Object) – DB connection
  • name (str) – dependency type name
get_message_type_id(cnx, name)[source]¶

selects message type id

Parameters:
  • cnx (Object) – DB connection
  • name (str) – message type name
insert_issue_tracker(cnx, repo_id, issue_tracker_name, issue_type, logger)[source]¶

inserts issue tracker

Parameters:
  • cnx (Object) – DB connection
  • repo_id (int) – id of the repository
  • issue_tracker_name (str) – name of the issue tracker
  • issue_type (str) – type of the issue tracker
  • logger (Object) – logger
insert_label(cnx, name, logger)[source]¶

inserts a label

Parameters:
  • cnx (Object) – DB connection
  • name (str) – the name of the label
  • logger (Object) – logger
insert_project(cnx, db_name, project_name)[source]¶

inserts a project in the DB

Parameters:
  • cnx (Object) – DB connection
  • db_name (str) – the name of an existing DB
  • project_name (str) – the name of the project to create
